titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for calling a Convention of Estates.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the second day of June, one thousand six hundred and sixty five, and of Our Reign the seventeenth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
